body_html:
I found that it has to do with the Google analytics script in application.html.slim .
With this switched off, everything loads under the recommended 200 ms. With the script switched on, even the plain users view needs way over 400 ms.

Makes sense?
body_text:
I found that  it has to do with the Google analytics script in application.html.slim  .
With this switched off, everything loads under the recommended 200 ms. With the script switched on, even the plain users view needs way over 400 ms.
Makes sense?
body:
I found that  it has to do with the [Google analytics script](https://github.com/TeamCheesy/rgsoc-teams/commit/1ee473d473d217f802a570f3ed978fb957a24915#diff-1ccd3e5828c7330cdc2450c78847cd35R32) in application.html.slim  .
With this switched off, everything loads under the recommended 200 ms. With the script switched on, even the plain `users` view needs way over 400 ms. 

Makes sense?
